Printing Info: Print or Save the PDF as Tabloid/A3 instead of A4 to print the whole resume and not just a part of it. Background Graphics should be enabled during Print/Save as Pdf. If the content is too much, then the pdf will inevitably overflow and it won't fit in one page. Try to limit your content or change your paper setting to print appropriately
OPTIONAL_FIELDS: Remove the key of these fields and they won't be rendered in the CV: websiteLink,websiteText, linkedinLink,linkedinText, githubLink, githubText
STYLE_OPTIONS: There are 6 style options available: 1,2,3,4,5,6. Select one of them in the key: 'Style Number' to render a different style
name: Nandan Grover
careerProfile: Full stack web developer with a passion for learning new technologies. Fast learner, organised, enthusiastic and with good communication skills. Able to join team and start delivering quickly.

experiences.description: As a developer at MITR I was a part of multiple projects ranging from work in Vanilla JS to latest frontend and backend frameworks. These projects can be grouped into two broad domains.Curriculum Associates - Lesson Editor (VueJS, JavaScript (ES7), Docker, GraphQL, MySQL, php): As an offshore team lead of 4 people, my job is to build new features, address bugs and issues. Support the team members and help them out in completing their tasks. Attend daily scrum and provide updates to the rest of the team. Vanilla JS and Node (JavaScript, React, jQuery, Canvas, HTML, CSS, Node): These projects included building tools in Node and creating interactive E-Learning materials using javascript and canvas. I got a chance to work on many such projects from companies such as Philips, IKEA, Chevron, Korn Ferry etc.

projectsIntro: To enhance my skills and hone my craft, I have undertaken below projects.

projects.title: User Interface To Manage Web Services Using Linux Containers(LXC)
projects.detail: Design and develop an UI using OpenStack Horizon service to interact with LXC,  working on OpenStack Magnum project

projects.title: Smart India Hackathon 2017- Passenger Security App for Indian Railways
projects.detail: This mobile app for passenger security in Indian Railways qualified for the final rounds of Smart India Hackathon at Udaipur. The system deals with all the aspects of Managing a Crime Report against any FIR lodged by passengers in Indian Railways. Passengers will be able to enter all details about the crimes, including the date and time, place, nature of crime and the location of the crime.

projects.title: Mobile Application for Connecting Farmers with Retailers
projects.detail: A mobile app that would enable farmers to connect directly to retailers. It will help maximize profits for both parties.
